modName: Mostly Undo PSB cheat for Skyrim
summary: This will remove ALMOST ALL spells and shouts created the PSB (portable spell book) cheat code, simply inputted as, PSB. Please read the warning before using.
descriptionHtml:
I, like many out there, made the grave mistake of using the PSB cheat code.

I pretty much ignored it for a while and went, "meh" not being much of a magic user (more archery anyways).

Finally, I got fed up. I couldn't reload a previous save since at that point I had invested so much time and leveled that I didn't have a previous save I wanted to use.

Finding that other BAT txt files were lacking, and only removing about 1% of the spells and shouts, I decided to go all out.

I found the code for nearly all the spells and shouts available.

So now here's my warning:

******WARNING******
This will remove ALMOST ALL spells/shouts created by the PSB cheat code.

This does not remove the "No name" spells. (because they had no name, so I couldn't find them.)

This does not remove the main spells you start with.

This will remove temporary quest related spells/shouts.

If you want certain spells back, you can find the ID for the spell book/tome in the excel file under type "BOOK." Then do: playeradditem.<Book ID>

If you have dedicated a lot of dragon souls this will remove the shouts you invested those dragon souls into, and you CANNOT GET THE DRAGON SOULS BACK.
But it isn't as if there aren't enough dragons in skyrim to go around slaying. Seriously, go slay some dragons.



P.S. A how to and additional side notes about the excel files are contained in the Read Me file. Please read it.
author: Skitzochinchi
